sentence.Network_en: a statue in commemoration of a national hero
We caused a medal to be struck in commemoration of this discovery.

sentence.Network_cn: 这座房子是滑铁卢战役纪念馆.

jx.jx_en_mean: as a reminder, especially a ritual or official one
jx.jx_cn_mean: 作为纪念（物）（尤指以仪式或官方方式）

lj.lj_ly: the window was ordered by the duchess in commemoration of her son.
lj.lj_ls: 公爵夫人定购了这扇窗来纪念她儿子。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin commemoratio(n-), from the verb commemorare 'bring to remembrance' (see commemorate)

entry.def: To commemorate an important event or person means to remember them by means of a special action, ceremony, or specially created object.

example.ex: One room contained a gallery of paintings commemorating great moments in baseball history...
example.tran: 有一个房间里陈列着很多纪念棒球史上伟大时刻的画作。

example.ex: The 200th anniversary of Mozart's death is being commemorated around the world with concerts featuring his work.
example.tran: 世界各地将举办以莫扎特的作品为主题的音乐会，以纪念他逝世200周年。

means.word_mean: 1. a ceremony to honor the memory of someone or something

auth_sentence.content: Surely such an event demands appropriate commemoration.
auth_sentence.res_content: Surely such an event demands appropriate commemoration.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Surely such an event demands appropriate commemoration.

auth_sentence.content: Earlier, Russian Orthodox Patriarch Kirill led a commemoration service in Kyiv.
auth_sentence.res_content: Earlier, Russian Orthodox Patriarch Kirill led a commemoration service in Kyiv.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Earlier, Russian Orthodox Patriarch Kirill led a commemoration service in Kyiv.

auth_sentence.content: Commemoration events began at the Pentagon on Friday - under heightened security.
auth_sentence.res_content: Commemoration events began at the Pentagon on Friday - under heightened security.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Commemoration events began at the Pentagon on Friday - under heightened security.

sentences.en: People are lining up to buy commemoration stamps.
sentences.cn: 人们正在排队购买纪念邮票。

sentences.en: This monument has been erected in commemoration of the victory over the enemy.
sentences.cn: 这纪念碑是为纪念战胜敌军而建立的。
